```{r fundResponseMXBim, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE} 

# Display Regression Table ----------------------------------------------------------------
reg.behavior$bd$results %>%
  kable(type = "html",
  caption = reg.behavior$bench.qtr.FE$title,
  align = c("l", rep("c", 7)),
  booktabs = TRUE,
  col.names = c("Dep. Var.:", "$\\Delta\\ln(AS)$", "$\\Delta\\ln(TL^{-1/2})$",
    "$\\Delta\\ln(L)$", "$\\Delta\\ln(S)$", "$\\Delta\\ln(D)$", 
    "$\\Delta\\ln(C)$", "$\\Delta\\ln(B)$")) %>%
  kable_styling(
    bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), 
    position = "center",
    font_size = 11) %>%
  footnote(reg.behavior$bench.qtr.FE$caption)
# --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
